SEARCH
Module clientCLI
Package com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.models

Class SocialModel

java.lang.Object
com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.models.SocialModel
public class SocialModel extends Object
The SocialModel class represents the models for handling social interactions and user engagement in the CLI application. It includes methods for toggling likes on products, reviews, sellers, and buyers, as well as methods for retrieving likes, reviews, and managing user interactions.

  • Method Details

    • toggleLikeProduct

      public OperationResult toggleLikeProduct(UUID productId, UUID userId)
      Toggles the like status for a product and adjusts the like count accordingly.
      Parameters:
      productId - The unique identifier of the product.
      userId - The unique identifier of the user performing the action.
      Returns:
      An OperationResult indicating the success or failure of the toggle action.

    • isLiked

      public boolean isLiked(UUID likedEntity, UUID likedByUser)
      Checks whether a user has liked a specific entity (product, review, seller, or buyer).
      Parameters:
      likedEntity - The unique identifier of the liked entity.
      likedByUser - The unique identifier of the user who liked the entity.
      Returns:
      true if the user has liked the entity, false otherwise.

    • toggleLikeReview

      public OperationResult toggleLikeReview(UUID reviewId, UUID userId)
      Toggles the like status for a review and adjusts fidelity points accordingly.
      Parameters:
      reviewId - The unique identifier of the review.
      userId - The unique identifier of the user performing the action.
      Returns:
      An OperationResult indicating the success or failure of the toggle action.

    • markReviewAsInappropriate

      public OperationResult markReviewAsInappropriate(UUID reviewId)
      Marks a review as inappropriate and adjusts fidelity points accordingly.
      Parameters:
      reviewId - The unique identifier of the review to be marked as inappropriate.
      Returns:
      An OperationResult indicating the success or failure of marking the review.

    • toggleLikeSeller

      public OperationResult toggleLikeSeller(UUID sellerId, UUID userId)
      Toggles the like status for a seller.
      Parameters:
      sellerId - The unique identifier of the seller.
      userId - The unique identifier of the user performing the action.
      Returns:
      An OperationResult indicating the success or failure of the toggle action.

    • toggleFollowBuyer

      public OperationResult toggleFollowBuyer(UUID buyerId, UUID userId)
      Toggles the follow status for a buyer and adjusts fidelity points accordingly.
      Parameters:
      buyerId - The unique identifier of the buyer to be followed/unfollowed.
      userId - The unique identifier of the user performing the action.
      Returns:
      An OperationResult indicating the success or failure of the toggle action.

    • getLikes

      public List<Like> getLikes(UUID likee, UUID liker, LikeType type)
      Retrieves a list of likes based on specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      likee - The unique identifier of the entity being liked (can be null).
      liker - The unique identifier of the user who liked the entity (can be null).
      type - The type of entity being liked (can be null).
      Returns:
      A list of likes that match the specified criteria.

    • getReviewsByProduct

      Returns:
      A list of reviews associated with the specified product.

    • getReviewsByAuthor

      Returns:
      A list of reviews written by the specified author.

    • getReview

      public Review getReview(UUID reviewId)
      Retrieves a specific review based on its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      reviewId - The unique identifier of the review.
      Returns:
      A Review object representing the review with the specified unique identifier.

    • addReview

      public OperationResult addReview(UUID productId, UUID authorId, String content, int rating)
      Adds a review for a specific product by the current user.
      Parameters:
      productId - The unique identifier of the product.
      authorId - The unique identifier of the review author.
      content - The content of the review.
      rating - The rating given to the product in the review.
      Returns:
      An OperationResult indicating the success or failure of the operation.

    • getReview

      public Review getReview(UUID productId, UUID authorId)
      Retrieves a review written by a specific author for a specific product.
      Parameters:
      productId - The unique identifier of the product.
      authorId - The unique identifier of the review author.
      Returns:
      The review written by the specified author for the specified product, or null if not found.

    • updateProductRating

      private void updateProductRating(UUID productId)
      Updates the rating of a product based on the average rating of its associated reviews.
      Parameters:
      productId - The unique identifier of the product.
